title: 24 Orange Cat Memes With 0 Brain Cells and 1,000 Silly on the Hooman Humor Meter
description: Are you a pawrent of an orange cat? If you are, on the one hand - you have less to worry about, because you have the cat but minus the brain. So, technically, it's less to worry about, because it's literally less of a thing in the cat. But on the other hand, the fact your orange buddy has yet to obtain the single brain cell all orange cats share creates other things you should worry about. Like the orange cat behavior. And yes, we're 200% sure that if you're an orange cat pawrent you know exactly what sort of behavior we're talking about. The orange kind.For everyone else who does not pawrent an orange feline friend, let us demonstrate it to you with the power of memes. We gathered some cat memes that demonstrate the power of a 0 brain cell orange cat to create silly chaos all around them. But it's not just the chaos, it's the… orangeness. And it's definitely great for meme material. It's no wonder this genre of cat memes is flourishing.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: 24 Orange Cat Memes With 0 Brain Cells and 1,000 Silly on the Hooman Humor Meter - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Are you a pawrent of an orange cat? If you are, on the one hand - you have less to worry about, because you have the cat but minus the brain. So, technically, it's less to worry about, because it's literally less of a thing in the cat. But on the other hand, the fact your orange buddy has yet to obtain the single brain cell all orange cats share creates other things you should worry about. Like the orange cat behavior. And yes, we're 200% sure that if you're an orange cat pawrent you know exactly what sort of behavior we're talking about. The orange kind.

For everyone else who does not pawrent an orange feline friend, let us demonstrate it to you with the power of memes. We gathered some cat memes that demonstrate the power of a 0 brain cell orange cat to create silly chaos all around them. But it's not just the chaos, it's the… orangeness. And it's definitely great for meme material. It's no wonder this genre of cat memes is flourishing.
